article: How to Install GamePigeon & Play Gomoku in the iPhone Messages App
intro: There are a lot of games on the iPhone, but did you know you can even play games right within your text messages? If you have iMessage and you're messaging another iPhone user (who has iMessage enabled) you can use the GamePigeon app to play the popular board game Gomoku (also called Go).

steps.title: Send your move.
steps.subtitle: Once your friend completes their move, you can play again. Remember to try and block your friend from placing stones in a row to keep them from winning.
sub-points: Keep sending moves back and forth until someone wins.
